#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int a[10025],left1[100025],right1[100025];
int main()
{
int t,n,maxdiff=-1,diff,max=-1000,min=152000;
//cin>>t;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
maxdiff=-1e9-1;max=-1e9-1,min=1e9+1;
//cout<<max<<" "<<min;
//cin>>n;
scanf("%d",&n);
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
{
//cin>>a[i];
scanf("%d",&a[i]);
}
int flag=0;
for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
{
if(a[i]<a[i+1])
{
flag=1;break;
}
}
if(flag==1)
{
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
{
if(a[i]<min)
min=a[i];
left1[i]=min;
}
for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
{
if(a[i]>max)
max=a[i];
right1[i]=max;
}
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
{
//cout<<left1[i]<<" "<<right1[i]<<endl;
diff=right1[i]-left1[i];
if(diff>maxdiff)
maxdiff=diff;
}
}
else
{
for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
{
diff=a[i+1]-a[i];
if(diff>maxdiff)
maxdiff=diff;
}
}
//cout<<maxdiff<<"\n";
printf("%d\n",maxdiff);

}
return 0;
}
